comments.body: Why not have getData not take a parameter and return `MVCArray<LatLng | WeightedLocation>` instead? It would be a lot easier not to require the caller to have to pass in the type.

@martincostello it is in fact a number
![2017-09-22 12 35 47](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2039539/30761339-b5278b7c-9f92-11e7-80ea-4d507074f9f2.png)
Ok cool. Wasn’t obvious from their naming it’d be an epoch.
